name: Deadly Goals
description:
Deadly Goals is a shooter game with 80s stylized graphics. There is a twist though- your weapon is a ball. Try to survive the fight, and score as many goals as you can. I strongly recommend full screen mode. Also, it's hard so prepare to die :)
Apart from sounds, everything in this game is made by me.
Music - Content Sensitive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDG8nIxK71A
Sound Effects- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
